column4: hello i need help with a minipci card in my laptop it wont work
does it show up in lspci?
i know but i dont know what it looks like in lspci
being netgear as you say it's most likely network equipment
yea but its a pain in the but to get it to work
hey is there a way to see if its athermos?
yes, lspci will tell you. marvell is not atheros (provided the marvell is the wireless and not the wired)
ok thanks. people on ubuntu lied to me i guess its suppose to be athermos
